Name: Revolutionary Flip
Ingredients: 10 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar to 1 water)
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE without ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: "Full-bodied" both describes this cocktail and how you'll feel after consuming this very tasty meal of a drink.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Markus Olsen at Ziloufs, Islington, London, England. Markus' original recipe uses equal parts molasses syrup and simple syrup in place of Demerara sugar syrup. It also contained 15ml/ 1/2 oz cream.
